p: For in vivo drug testing, C57BL/6J mice were purchased from Charles River Laboratories. Tivozanib-treated mice (0.5 mg kg −1, per os) were infected as described above, whereas pimozide (20 mg kg −1, via os)- and TOFA (25 mg kg −1, via intraperitoneal)-treated mice were subcutaneously infected with CHIKV C21 in the footpad (10 3 PFU). Mouse health status and body weight were scored daily.
